Author: wbornor
Title: New House leadership has lively Internet agenda

Author: nostrademons
Title: Moonlighter's Dilemma: Guide to Starting a Startup PartTime

Author: palish
Content: I see what you're getting at.  What I meant was, I work 50 hour weeks.  During my spare time, I'm getting my business up and running.  If I can ever be in a position which I can focus on my business full time without starving, then I'll do that.  That'll happen right around when I save up $15k, or the business is successful.  Just because there's no way out of my job doesn't make me not an entrepreneur :P
